content: staff single stitches upper part like a silver band now the top can be decorated i did this the same way with green embroidery thread and then embroidered with pink french knots in between if you want to make a pointed top you crochet rounds 1 to 14 the same way as for the fairy staff 15 in blo of round 14 with cream 10sc = 10 16 - 17 10sc = 10 2rounds 18 3sc decrease *2 = 8 19 8sc = 8 20 single_crochet decrease single_crochet *2 = 6 fo weave in end this one i decorated with golden and silver embroidery thread i added some blush and two small leaves you can do this however you like let your imagination run wild @thenickcole 13 congratulations your cycloom is now ready i hope you had fun crocheting him i would love to see your cycloom when you show it on social media so please use the #cycloom and tag me @thenickcole so i can see your work thank you ©2023 @thenickcole this is an original pattern by @thenickcole please do not copy alter redistribute or sell this pattern as your own in part or as a whole thank you again @thenickcole
